origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_details', 'description': 'This function provides detailed information about an insurance policy based on the insurance type, coverage level, and age of the applicant.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'insuranceType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of insurance, e.g., health, life, dental.'}, {'name': 'coverageLevel', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The level of coverage desired, e.g., standard, premium.'}, {'name': 'age', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the person applying for the policy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'details', 'description': 'A detailed description of the insurance policy including coverage limits, premiums, and exclusions.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_details, 它的参数输入如下: 'insuranceType'是'health', 'coverageLevel'是'standard', 'age'是'24'.
